short_summary: Purchase one UAES-110B Handheld FTIR Spectrometer
description: Laboratory Scientific Equipment, SA E60PV-19EQUIFor: The purchase of one (1) Hand-held FTIR following the requirements indicated on the tender.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Handheld FTIR Spectrometer - Kentville Research and Development Centre

## Reference Number
PW-22-01014783

## Tender Details

*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-04T14:00:00
*   Date of Publication: 2022-11-25
*   Solicitation Number: 01B46-22-136

## Opportunity Information

*   Procurement Category: Good and Services
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Region of Opportunity: Worldwide
*   Region of Delivery: Nova Scotia

## Supplier Information

*   Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.
*   Suppliers must have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

## Contact Information

*   Claudia Lauzier
*   Email: claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca
*   Phone: 438-455-2392

## Documents

*   A link to the tender documents is available on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell Canada website.
